snippet.title: Alien Quarantine - Mobile Game Trailer
snippet.description:
★ The most intense space survival horror game available for your phone! ★

Live out your most horrible nightmare and fight for survival in the darkest, most fear-inducing environments against endless hordes of terrifying space horrors.
 As a desperate mercenary, you must overcome a wide range of daunting challenges both inside a spaceship and on a burning red planet. Unlock powerful weapons and let your fear take over through impressive rendering of light and shadows. And remember, you never know what's hiding in the dark...


★★★★★★★★★★
Visit our official site at:  http://www.gameloft.com
Follow us on Twitter at:  http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.
Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft 
Discover our blog at:  http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.
